protein.general_function: Involved in acid-amino acid ligase activity
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the covalent attachment of ubiquitin or ISG15 to other proteins. Functions in the E6/E6-AP-induced ubiquitination of p53/TP53. Promotes ubiquitination and subsequent proteasomal degradation of FLT3.

go_class.description: negative regulation of type I interferon production

reference.reference_text: Ardley HC, Rose SA, Tan N, Leek JP, Markham AF, Robinson PA: Genomic organization of the human ubiquitin-conjugating enzyme gene, UBE2L6 on chromosome 11q12. Cytogenet Cell Genet. 2000;89(1-2):137-40.
